item.title: sync licensing
item.description: Leaving Things Sync licensing for film, dance, etc., is managed through Leaving Things. Leaving Things Music Sync Licensing works with a tightly curated group of experimental musicians to foster connections between visual creatives looking for songs, custom compositions, and sounds that are engaging, unique and left-of-center.
